newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EP rules out using EU funds to develop weapons.
newsitem.headline: EP rules out using EU funds to develop weapons.

text.p: Countries which put European Union-funded research to military use should be forced to return the money, the European Parliament said on Thursday.
In a report on future EU science and technology policy, Euro-MPS said they objected to all use of EU research funds to develop weapons.
Parliament said the EU's fifth research framework programme, which will structure EU research at the start of the 21st century, should be clearly market-oriented.

The programme should focus on helping small and medium-sized enterprises as well as big industry and should do more to ensure the results of basic research were transformed into patentable technologies, Euro-MPs said.
